video.title: Hercules: The Legendary Journeys
video.synopsis: Half-god/half-human Hercules travels the world fighting off baddies, defending those unable to defend themselves and finding a little romance.

episodes.synopsis: Hera orders the killing of the family of her stepson, Hercules, sending him on a path of vengeance and heroism, aided by his legendary strength.
episodes.title: The Wrong Path

episodes.synopsis: Townspeople recruit Hercules to vanquish a Cyclops who besieged their village. Yet Hercules discovers goodness in the misunderstood creature.
episodes.title: Eye of the Beholder

episodes.synopsis: A band of refugees headed for the city of Calydon is under siege from the wrathful Hera. Hercules protects them, unaware of a secret one is hiding.
episodes.title: The Road to Calydon

episodes.synopsis: Hercules is summoned to the kingdom of Meliad, where a power struggle threatens to end a noble king's life at the height of the Dionysian festival.
episodes.title: The Festival of Dionysus

episodes.synopsis: As Ares, the god of war, assembles a children's army, Hercules and Atalanta race to stop him, with the help of two boys rescued from Ares's control.
episodes.title: Ares

episodes.synopsis: Nemis the centaur is obsessed with the beautiful Penelope. Hera offers to help Nemis get the girl -- if he'll destroy Hercules.
episodes.title: As Darkness Falls

episodes.synopsis: Pride lands Iolaus into trouble time after time, prompting Hera to send Nemesis to kill him. Only through a selfless act will Iolaus be saved.
episodes.title: Pride Comes Before a Brawl

episodes.synopsis: A slave trader sells a band of refugees into bondage. When he finds a beautiful girl to be sold, Hercules frees her so she may marry her beloved.
episodes.title: The March to Freedom

episodes.synopsis: Iolanus's love for warrior woman Xena blinds him to her evil nature and causes a rift in his friendship with Hercules, who only wants to save him.
episodes.title: The Warrior Princess

episodes.synopsis: Hercules and Iolanus agree to help free the unjustly enslaved Gladius. But Gladius's captors pit him against Hercules in a gladiatorial combat.
episodes.title: Gladiator

episodes.synopsis: Hercules tries to resolve a feud between two siblings. Their war has ravaged the land, with the fallen soldiers vanishing mysteriously as they die.
episodes.title: The Vanishing Dead

episodes.synopsis: The warrior princess Xena continues her path of destruction, but a power struggle reveals she may not be as great a threat as her second in command.
episodes.title: The Gauntlet

episodes.synopsis: Xena joins forces with Hercules to stop her evil former lieutenant Darphus, who's been resurrected from the dead. Ares guides Darphus on the warpath.
episodes.title: Unchained Heart

episodes.synopsis: When Iolaus is framed for thievery, Hercules sets out to nab the real culprit. Meanwhile King Menelaos's daughter acts as Iolaus's lawyer.
episodes.title: The King of Thieves

episodes.synopsis: Hercules travels to a gambling palace run by King Midas and the seductive Voluptua, only to find that the place has corrupted the land.
episodes.title: All That Glitters

episodes.synopsis: Hercules encounters deadly traps as he tries to rescue Iolaus from the warlord Gorgus, who's joined forces with a man claiming to be Hercules.
episodes.title: What's in a Name?

episodes.synopsis: Hercules and Iolaus capture the marauding Goth and escort him to Athens for trial, with Goth's brother Bledar on their trail.
episodes.title: Siege at Naxos

episodes.synopsis: Bigotry and hatred have torn apart the small village where the human Lyla lives with her centaur husband, Deric, and their young son.
episodes.title: Outcast

episodes.synopsis: A town is under the shadow of a debauched pleasure palace. Atticus, a farmer robbed by the palace's thugs, asks Hercules for help rescuing his wife.
episodes.title: Under the Broken Sky

episodes.synopsis: As vengeance for her children slain by Hercules, Echidna, the mother of all monsters, plans to force Hercules's mother to witness his death.
episodes.title: The Mother of All Monsters

episodes.synopsis: The goddess Demeter pleads for Hercules's help in rescuing her daughter Persephone from the clutches of Hades, god of the underworld.
episodes.title: The Other Side

episodes.synopsis: Salmoneus incurs the gods' wrath when he sells a treasure belonging to Hera. Hercules must rescue him from Nemesis, the goddess of divine retribution.
episodes.title: The Fire Down Below

episodes.synopsis: Hercules is torn when he discovers that his new friend, the giant Typho, is the husband of Echidna, mother of all monsters, whom Hercules imprisoned.
episodes.title: Cast a Giant Shadow

episodes.synopsis: Wrongly imprisoned in place of Sisyphus, innocent Timuron is executed. Outraged, Hades demands Hercules and Iolaus bring Sisyphus to the underworld.
episodes.title: Highway to Hades

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to exonerate a friend who's been framed for murder and sentenced to death, Hercules and Iolaus search for the Sword of Veracity.
episodes.title: The Sword of Veracity

episodes.synopsis: Nemesis is distracted from her mission to kill Hercules by her love for him. Hera, furious, creates an invincible inhuman warrior.
episodes.title: The Enforcer

episodes.synopsis: When a demon steals the Golden Fleece, Hercules leads the Argonauts to retrieve it and redeem Jason, still mourning over the death of his family.
episodes.title: Once a Hero

episodes.synopsis: Hercules sets out to free a kingdom from the grip of a ruthless leader. Iolaus, imbued with the power to tell the future, aids him in his quest.
episodes.title: Heedless Hearts

episodes.synopsis: Hercules organizes a series of athletic contests -- the first Olympic Games -- to determine the strongest men in two rival villages.
episodes.title: Let the Games Begin

episodes.synopsis: Aphrodite has ulterior motives when she gives Iolaus the gift of a golden apple, which will make any woman he wishes fall in love with him.
episodes.title: The Apple

episodes.synopsis: When the bride-to-be Ramina is abducted, Hercules sets out to rescue her, and discovers that the story of Ramina's abduction has more than one side.
episodes.title: Promises

episodes.synopsis: When Iolaus finds that Orestes's brother has his eye on the throne, plotting to kill the future king, Iolaus volunteers to stand in for the prince.
episodes.title: King for a Day

episodes.synopsis: Hercules's friend Thanis, a sculptor, is about to have both his hands cut off as punishment for a robbery he didn't commit.
episodes.title: Protean Challenge

episodes.synopsis: King Jason abdicates the throne in order to marry Hercules's mother, Alcmene, naming Iphicles as his successor and enraging Hera in the process.
episodes.title: The Wedding of Alcmene

episodes.synopsis: When Aphrodite gives Deon the gift of persuasion, the power attracts Deon's uncle Karis, who decides to become more involved in the young man's life.
episodes.title: The Power

episodes.synopsis: Centaur Ceridian's dying wish is for Cassius to make peace with humans. Hercules persuades the young centaur to abandon his plans for war.
episodes.title: Centaur Mentor Journey

episodes.synopsis: Hercules and Iolaus must rescue the beautiful Melina from the Cave of Echoes, a place from which no one has ever emerged alive.
episodes.title: The Cave of Echoes

episodes.synopsis: Pirates and grotesque wormlike creatures are just a few of the obstacles the son of Zeus encounters when he becomes shipwrecked on a desert island.
episodes.title: Mercenary

episodes.synopsis: With his good friend Daedalus grief-stricken over the death of his son Icarus, Hercules travels to Euboea to offer solace.
episodes.title: Doomsday

episodes.synopsis: When love goddess Aphrodite becomes bored with her matchmaking calling, the Earth's ladies lose all interest in mortal men.
episodes.title: Love Takes a Holiday

episodes.synopsis: Awakened by tomb robbers, the mummy Ishtar roams the Earth, finding a home in Salmoneus's "House of Horrors." Now, it's up to Hercules to destroy him.
episodes.title: Mummy Dearest

episodes.synopsis: Hera, Hercules's evil stepmother, continues her quest to destroy Zeus's son -- this time sending the Enforcer II, a new assassin made of fire.
episodes.title: Not Fade Away

episodes.synopsis: When gentle giant Typhon and monster Echidna give birth, their happiness is cut short when the child is abducted. Now, Hercules must rescue baby Obie.
episodes.title: Monster Child in the Promised Land

episodes.synopsis: After intercepting an arrow meant for Psyche -- the object of Cupid's affection -- Hercules himself falls for the mortal beauty.
episodes.title: The Green-Eyed Monster

episodes.synopsis: With Queen Parnassa looking for a replacement son, Hera zaps Hercules's memory and presents him as the heir to the throne.
episodes.title: Prince Hercules

episodes.synopsis: Somebody needs to save the babes when King Polonius orders the slaughter of all infants upon receiving a prophecy that a newborn will rule the land.
episodes.title: A Star to Guide Them

episodes.synopsis: Dragons aren't born bad; they're made bad, as witnessed by the warlord Adamis manipulating the dragon Braxis into killing anyone who knows Hercules.
episodes.title: The Lady and the Dragon

episodes.synopsis: Iolaus assumes the identity of his cousin, King Orestes, when a neighboring ruler offs the monarch in an effort to thwart his plans to bring peace.
episodes.title: Long Live the King

episodes.synopsis: Hera is up to evil once again as she offers Callisto freedom and a shot at immortality in exchange for killing Hercules.
episodes.title: Surprise

episodes.synopsis: Intent on killing Hercules and gaining the golden horns and hooves of the half-woman, half-deer Serena, Prince Nestor enlists the aid of war god Ares.
episodes.title: Encounter

episodes.synopsis: Hercules and Serena travel to the Other Side to get his dead wife's blessing, and Ares demands a huge price for Serena's freedom.
episodes.title: When a Man Loves a Woman

episodes.synopsis: Having given up his godly strength as a condition of Serena's freedom, Hercules struggles to adjust after he's framed for a crime he didn't commit.
episodes.title: Judgment Day

episodes.synopsis: While searching for his missing cousin, Iolaus stumbles upon an underground utopian city inhabited by blissed-out hippies.
episodes.title: The Lost City

episodes.synopsis: In 18th century France, noblewoman Marie DeValle is captured, and two outlaws take inspiration from the tales of Hercules and set out to rescue her.
episodes.title: Les Contemptibles

episodes.synopsis: Delusional King Augeus believes himself to be Zeus, so Hera offers to give the mad monarch godly powers if he can kill Hercules by sunset.
episodes.title: Reign of Terror

episodes.synopsis: Cunning but clumsy thief Autolycus stops time when he steals the Cronus Stone. As a result, he and Hercules travel back in time five years.
episodes.title: End of the Beginning

episodes.synopsis: Vowing revenge on Hercules for freeing Princess Melissa and the rest of the slave girls, Princess Alexa attacks him with the Fist of Tolas.
episodes.title: War Bride

episodes.synopsis: Determined to find out whether Cassus really murdered an entire family, Hercules fights him to try to extract a confession.
episodes.title: A Rock and a Hard Place

episodes.synopsis: Washed up on the shores of Atlantis after his transport ship sinks, Hercules encounters Cassandra, who warns him of the island city's imminent demise.
episodes.title: Atlantis

episodes.synopsis: When Hercules is charged with finding the kidnapped Leanna, his search takes him up a beanstalk and into a castle in the clouds.
episodes.title: Beanstalks and Bad Eggs

episodes.synopsis: When Fortune, the goddess of luck, tries to ease Iolaus's suffering by erasing his memory of a depressing event, she wipes out all his memories.
episodes.title: Hero's Heart

episodes.synopsis: When Celesta, goddess of death, comes for Hercules's old pal Jaris, the son of Zeus remembers his first encounter with the goddess.
episodes.title: Regrets...I've Had a Few

episodes.synopsis: Hercules and Iolaus are in for the fight of their lives when they join lady buccaneer Nebula in taking on the terrifying spider woman Arachne.
episodes.title: Web of Desire

episodes.synopsis: When a lightning bolt from a dying Zeus opens up a parallel universe, everything is topsy-turvy as Iolaus becomes a jester and Hercules a tyrant.
episodes.title: Stranger in a Strange World

episodes.synopsis: A baby with godlike powers has Nemesis falsely identifying Hercules as the father and the goddess Discord making off with the babe.
episodes.title: Two Men and a Baby

episodes.synopsis: Looking to right a wrong from years past, Hercules frees a young man who was sold into slavery after renegade Amazons killed his parents.
episodes.title: Prodigal Sister

episodes.synopsis: A village girl convinces Hercules to join her in a hoofing contest. Now he must not only dance but fight off the henchmen sent by the competition.
episodes.title: ...And Fancy Free

episodes.synopsis: Things quickly spin out of control when Hercules agrees to pose nude for a museum centerpiece in exchange for a donation to charity.
episodes.title: If I Had a Hammer

episodes.synopsis: Hercules lands on trial for manslaughter, sedition and more when authorities accuse the son of Zeus of putting others in danger.
episodes.title: Hercules on Trial

episodes.synopsis: Harkening back to Hercules's youth, the son of Zeus and his pals Iolaus and Jason set out on a mission to kill Hera's hideous two-headed pet.
episodes.title: Medea Culpa

episodes.synopsis: Wrongly accused of murder, Salmoneus and Autolycus elude authorities by donning drag and posing as members of an all-girl dance group.
episodes.title: Men in Pink

episodes.synopsis: All hell breaks loose as Hope frees warrior-goddess Callisto and unleashes her on the world with express instructions to destroy Hercules.
episodes.title: Armageddon Now (Part 1)

episodes.synopsis: Hercules and the Sovereign are locked in a battle in a parallel universe, Iolaus goes back in time to prevent Callisto from killing Hercules's mother.
episodes.title: Armageddon Now (Part 2)

episodes.synopsis: Hercules gets shot by Artemis's bow and is transformed into a pig: He quickly finds himself a female pig and a parrot through which to communicate.
episodes.title: Porkules

episodes.synopsis: Artemis's errant bow continues its mischief as Aphrodite uses it to turn Katherine the pig into Katherine the woman while Hercules must rescue Iolaus.
episodes.title: One Fowl Day

episodes.synopsis: Bumbling thief Autolycus uses ex-girlfriend Cupcake to distract Prince Alexandros while he attempts to steal the sapphire of Antioch.
episodes.title: My Fair Cupcake

episodes.synopsis: When King Iphicles -- brother of Hercules -- loses his wife while out controlling rioting soldiers, he blames the soldiers and their leader Ajax.
episodes.title: War Wounds

episodes.synopsis: With his mother's health failing, Hercules reflects on past battles -- particularly the one in which the Parthans invaded Caylan territory.
episodes.title: Twilight

episodes.synopsis: Hercules's relationship with Zeus comes to a head when, upon the death of Hercules's mother, Zeus invites him to join him in ruling Olympus.
episodes.title: Top God

episodes.synopsis: Upon reaching Olympus, Hercules discovers the real reason his father has invited him there: to protect Zeus against the evil Hera and the other gods.
episodes.title: Reunions

episodes.synopsis: Hercules and Iolaus travel to Sumeria to help King Gilgamesh deal with the angry gods attacking his cities. But Gilgamesh has a darker agenda.
episodes.title: Faith

episodes.synopsis: Hercules and Nebula take a voyage to the Underworld to reclaim Iolaus after his death. But the road they travel takes a series of treacherous turns.
episodes.title: Descent

episodes.synopsis: Still reeling from Iolaus's death, Hercules winds up on the island of Eire, where the downtrodden Druids greet him as the "Chosen One."
episodes.title: Resurrection

episodes.synopsis: Salmoneus and Autolycus acquire a magic lamp and release Jinni the genie, who grants them three wishes that don't turn out as they expected.
episodes.title: Genies and Grecians and Geeks, Oh My

episodes.synopsis: Morrigan wavers between her good and evil sides, and Hercules grows closer to her as he tries to help her become a peaceful Druid.
episodes.title: Render Unto Caesar

episodes.synopsis: Hercules travels to Norway, where he meets up with the Norse god Balder. Hercules agrees to help protect Balder, who has dreamed of his own death.
episodes.title: Norse by Norsevest

episodes.synopsis: When Norse god Odin looks into a magical mask that blinds him, all three prophesized tragedies transpire, and the end of the world seems imminent.
episodes.title: Somewhere Over the Rainbow Bridge

episodes.synopsis: Hercules leaves the island of Eire when a disturbing vision calls him to Sumeria. There, he finds Nebula facing danger from the demon Dahak.
episodes.title: Darkness Rising

episodes.synopsis: The studio orders the staff of "Hercules" to develop improved plots for upcoming episodes. But someone is trying to kill the staff members.
episodes.title: For Those of You Just Joining Us

episodes.synopsis: With help from Morrigan and Nebula, Hercules sets out to remove Dahak's evil soul from Iolaus's body to give his old friend's spirit peace in death.
episodes.title: Let There Be Light

episodes.synopsis: Hercules, Nebula, Morrigan and Zarathustra continue their quest to free Iolaus's spirit -- and the world -- from the clutches of the evil Dahak.
episodes.title: Redemption

episodes.synopsis: When an active volcano endangers Mount Pelion's people, Hercules devises a plan to use explosive crystals to blow a hole in the side of the volcano.
episodes.title: Sky High

episodes.synopsis: After jumping into the Netherworld, Hercules works to free the gods, who fled here to escape Dahak but are trapped in the Labyrinth of Eternal Memory.
episodes.title: Stranger and Stranger

episodes.synopsis: Traveling with Iolaus II, Hercules reminisces about his fast friend, the original Iolaus, and the day they retrieved a stolen ruby.
episodes.title: Just Passing Through

episodes.synopsis: Traveling to Cyprus to help an Oracle, Hercules and Morrigan reminisce about their relationship while priestess Havisha wants to murder the Oracle.
episodes.title: We'll Always Have Cyprus

episodes.synopsis: When Zylus, a student at Cheiron's old military academy, leads a rebellion at the school, Hercules and Jason must thwart the teenager's plans.
episodes.title: The Academy

episodes.synopsis: Iolaus II and mermaid Nautica fall deeply in love after she leaves the sea to escape the marriage her father, Triton, arranged for her.
episodes.title: Love on the Rocks

episodes.synopsis: When the wizard Merlin launches the young and brash King Arthur back to 500 B.C. to teach him a lesson, Hercules travels to England to help.
episodes.title: Once Upon a Future King

episodes.synopsis: After Hercules destroys the cursed Rock of Arges to save the helpless villagers from a deadly fate, he slowly begins to vanish.
episodes.title: Fade Out

episodes.synopsis: When Iolaus II learns his girlfriend, Nautica, has sprouted legs and is planning to marry Lysaka, Hercules locates Triton to see what's going on.
episodes.title: My Best Girl's Wedding

episodes.synopsis: As Armageddon draws near, the Archangel Michael releases the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse. Iolaus returns from the other side to warn Hercules.
episodes.title: Revelations

episodes.synopsis: A woman who looks just like Hercules's ex-wife, Serena, persuades Hercules to help her capture Xerxos. But her hidden agenda puts Hercules in danger.
episodes.title: Be Deviled

episodes.synopsis: After a breakup with Hephaestus, Aphrodite accidentally casts a spell on the Amazons, causing them to obey orders from Deimos.
episodes.title: Love, Amazon Style

episodes.synopsis: After Creon takes Oedipus's throne, Hercules helps restore Oedipus's daughter, Princess Antigone, to her rightful place as ruler of Thebes.
episodes.title: Rebel with a Cause

episodes.synopsis: Hercules and Iolaus travel to Dacia to help Hercules's old friend Vlad fight the vampires that have been attacking his people.
episodes.title: Darkness Visible

episodes.synopsis: A trip to Greece for the opening of a bank turns sour for Autolycus when he runs into his ex-wife, Luscious, then lands in jail, accused of robbery.
episodes.title: Hercules, Tramps & Thieves

episodes.synopsis: Hercules and Iolaus travel to Egypt as ambassadors for Greece and find themselves in the middle of a battle between members of the royal family.
episodes.title: City of the Dead

episodes.synopsis: When Hercules and Iolaus visit a village, a witch persuades town leaders that Hercules is a warlock and Ceska may hold the key to Hercules's fate.
episodes.title: A Wicked Good Time

episodes.synopsis: Zeus frees Hera from the Abyss of Tartarus, releasing the Titans as well. Hercules must save the world when the Titans scheme to destroy Olympus.
episodes.title: Full Circle
